summary: Fixed jq != operator escaping issue across 1 command file, 7 skill files, and 4 documentation files by replacing select(.type != "X") with select(.type == "X" | not) pattern.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting all file changes and verification results

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed Claude Code Issue #1132 jq escaping bug across all skill and command files. Replaced 8 instances of select(.type != "X") with select(.type == "X" | not) pattern, updated documentation with safe pattern guidance, and added jq Command Safety section to CLAUDE.md.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added 'jq Command Safety' section to CLAUDE.md with safe pattern quick reference. Updated jq-escaping-workarounds.md with != escaping documentation, inline-status-update.md with warning note, and error-handling.md jq_parse_failure section.

next_steps: Run /revise on a test task to verify the fix works correctly
